title: Throwing Knife
special: Fragile. Thrown, x4/x8. If thrown, damage die increases to 1d6.

title: Steel Bumper Sword
special: Two Handed. Slow. Always Cleaves. Weighted. Reach.

title: Guitar Sword
special: Defensive. The first six times the weapon gains a level of decay you take 1 damage.

title: Ski Sword
special: Defensive. Sturdy. If you have two, you can ski.

title: Commie Whacker
special: If the target admits they are a communist, the weapon always critically hits.

title: Stop Sign
special: Two Handed. Slow. Reach.  Applies Dazed

title: Plasma Cutter
criticalbonus: Applies severe arm or leg condition.
